original_text: The light of the body is the eye: if therefore thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light.
korean_text: 눈은 몸의 등불이니 그러므로 네 눈이 성하면 온 몸이 밝을 것이요

sentences.original_text: The light of the body is the eye
if therefore thine eye be single
thy whole body shall be full of light
sentences.korean_translation: 네 온 몸이 빛으로 가득 찰 것이다
